LanguageData.AS_AT_Impact_Knuckles.label: Impact Knuckles
LanguageData.AS_WHE_WAESword.label: Ancient Elf Sword
LanguageData.AS_WHE_WAESword.description: A sword made with ancient elf technology. Uranium is used for the blade, making it extremely durable, yet simple to sharpen.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_WAESword_Re.label: Ancient Elven Sword (Replica)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_WAESword_Re.description: A replica of an ancient elf sword, recreated with half-elf technology. Uranium is used for the blade, giving it a black finish.
